name: Salmon Marinade
ingredients: 1/2 cup – Sake or rice vinegar or white wine
LOTS – Garlic, finely chopped or grated
1-2 tsp – Orange or lemon or pineapple juice
instructions: Mix together all the ingredients in a bowl
Add marinade to zip lock bags
Add salmon to zip lock bags
Marinade in fridge for 2 hours or at room temp for 1 hour
BBQ or bake salmon until cooked through

additional_context.source: Dr. Dan gave us this recipe
additional_context.story: Dr. Dan is Isaac's family friend who joined on many of the family vacations when Isaac was growing up.
